title: Cisco security advisory (AV25-848) – Update 1
description: On December 17, 2025, Cisco published a security advisory to address a critical vulnerability in the following products:
products: Cisco Secure Email Gateway  all versions of AsyncOS with Spam Quarantine feature enabled and exposed on the internet
Cisco Secure Email and Web Manager  all versions of AsyncOS with Spam Quarantine feature enabled and exposed on the internet
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
